fun_fact: James Roday co-wrote several episodes of *Psych* and even directed a few. He is also known for his role in the horror-comedy *Gravy* which he co-wrote and directed.
hobby: Tricking people into believing he's psychic while indulging in pineapple-flavored snacks.

fun_fact: Dulé Hill is an accomplished tap dancer and even showcased his skills in a few episodes of *Psych*.
hobby: Collecting obscure facts about pharmaceuticals and perfecting his 'super sniffer' skills.

fun_fact: Timothy Omundson suffered a stroke in 2017 but made a remarkable recovery and returned for the *Psych* movies.
hobby: Cleaning his gun collection and practicing how to glare intimidatingly at criminals and co-workers alike.

fun_fact: Maggie Lawson was in a real-life relationship with James Roday Rodriguez during much of the series.
hobby: Kicking butt in undercover missions while keeping up with the latest trends in crime-solving techniques.

fun_fact: Kirsten Nelson was pregnant during the filming of the pilot episode, which led to her character also being pregnant in the series.
hobby: Juggling police work and family life, all while maintaining a calm, cool, and collected demeanor.

fun_fact: Corbin Bernsen is the son of veteran soap opera actress Jeanne Cooper and is known for his extensive collection of snow globes.
hobby: Fishing while offering unsolicited life lessons and making sure Shawn sticks to his strict rules.
